sentences.sContent: Keep away from that dog, he can be vicious.
sentences.sCn: 离那只狗远点，它有时很凶猛。

sentences.sContent: ...Perlow calls this vicious cycle the "cycle of responsiveness" : Once bosses and colleagues experience an employee's increased responsiveness...
...starting the whole vicious cycle all over again...
...Quotas will break this vicious cycle by putting lots of women at the top...

synos.tran: 恶毒的；恶意的；堕落的；有错误的；品性不端的；剧烈的

phrases.pCn: n. 恶性螺旋形上升；[经]恶性通货膨胀螺旋

trans.tranCn: 恶毒的， 凶残的； 剧烈的， 严重的
trans.tranOther: violent and cruel in a way that hurts someone physically
